#
# Huawei VRP Interface Configuration Examples
# Various interface types and configurations
#
sysname SW-ACCESS-01
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/1
 description Uplink to Distribution Switch
 port link-type trunk
 port trunk pvid vlan 1
 port trunk allow-pass vlan 10 20 30 40 50
 storm suppression broadcast packets 1000
 storm suppression multicast packets 500
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/2
 description Access Port - User PC
 port link-type access
 port default vlan 20
 stp edged-port enable
 port-security enable
 port-security max-mac-num 2
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/3
 description IP Phone + PC
 port link-type hybrid
 voice-vlan 100 enable
 port hybrid pvid vlan 20
 port hybrid untagged vlan 20
 port hybrid tagged vlan 100
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/4
 description Shutdown - Reserved
 shutdown
#
interface XGigabitEthernet 0/0/1
 description 10G Uplink to Core
 port link-type trunk
 port trunk allow-pass vlan all
 undo shutdown
#
interface 40GE 0/0/1
 description 40G Uplink to Spine
 port link-type trunk
 port trunk allow-pass vlan 1 to 4094
 undo shutdown
#
interface Eth-Trunk 1
 description LAG to Server Farm
 port link-type trunk
 port trunk allow-pass vlan 30 31 32
 mode lacp-static
 max active-linknumber 4
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/5
 eth-trunk 1
 description LAG Member 1
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/6
 eth-trunk 1
 description LAG Member 2
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/7
 eth-trunk 1
 description LAG Member 3
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/8
 eth-trunk 1
 description LAG Member 4
 undo shutdown
#
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 10.255.255.1 255.255.255.255
 description Management Loopback
#
interface NULL0
 description Null Interface for Blackholing
#
return
